thread.section_title: Rosewood Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hotel
thread.title_full: Hotel - Review of Rosewood Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: SMJL15
title: Hotel
text: The Rosewood is very elegant and luxurious. Our deluxe room has a large walk in closet, sitting area and very comfortable king bed. We watched the Chinese New Years fireworks from our bed. The upgraded tech amenities are top notch. Very helpful and polite staff. The breakfast buffet is a true feast. Highly recommend this lovely hotel.
